tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
The doctor explained the health issue very patiently and she was very friendly at the same time disciplined enough to explain about the medicines. Have recommended her to my circle too. Really satisfied with the after services as she messaged about the recovery too. Her fees is also very economical and also the time of appointment was justified too. 
Very much satisfied with doctor Leena and she's a very good person at heart. My kids love her too as they are no more afraid of going to doctors. 
Wish her all the very best from our family for her success. May she keep on doing the good work Nd achieve lots of success and all her dreams come true. 
Regards

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was looking for a doctor when all my family members at Delhi were detected covid positive with severe lung infection, got the reference of Dr Batra from my relatives who had prior consulted ma'am for covid treatment. The treatment prescribed by ma'am for my 87 yr old grandmother and for my father suffering from lung infection was very effective.within two days they were on recovery path and now in the pink of their health with no post covid complications. Above all her initiative to help humanity in these times of unprecedented crisis by not charging consultation fee makes her a humane and considerate doctor. The depth of knowledge,patience and understanding which ma'am has in explaining things to patients and their panic stricken relatives is really credit worthy.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback.Stay healthy üôèüòä

review: I was facing very bad dry cough and was not having any clues of what to do. It was so messed up that I can't tell, as I also got most of covid symptoms for which report was pending at same time. That's the moment of impact of my life, when I striked through Dr. Leena Ma'am over practo. She listened to me very patiently & shared very good diagnosis plan. I shared her my covid test report & she was there even at 11pm to revert me (amazing). I'm currently following her diagnosis.... More power to u ma'am. God bless you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I, Ramesh Kumar, aged 66 years, having diabetes, had experienced fever and throat soaring on 17th Aug'20 which made me nervous at that time.
Then, I came in consultation with Dr. Leena Batra (physician) and detailed the position.
As per guidance, I underwent Covid test and tested positive.
Dr. Leena Batra first helped with the counseling and simultaneously started medications and regular monitoring. 
I followed her advices and medications sincerely and my health showed continuous improvement over time.
Now, I am much more stable and have no symptoms or fever since 25th Aug'20.
I am waiting for the quarantine period to get over.
Thanks to doctor for patient hearing and expert advices. 
I wish her great success in her professional as well as social Life.

Regards,
reply_text: Thanks for the feedback. Stay healthy üôèüòä
